House Bill/Resolution NO. PS00083
FULL TITLE : AS A RESULT OF THE DEATH OF HIS DRIVER, WHILE WAITING INSIDE HIS CAR, HE PROPOSED THAT THE HOUSE PROVIDE THEM WITH A LOUNGE WHERE THEY CAN STAY AND WAIT
SHORT TITLE : Call On House Officials And The Lsb To Ensure Safety And Security In All Areas Of The House
ABSTRACT : Rep. Sarmiento talked about the unfortunate incident that happened...that caused the life of his personal driver...; believed that his driver was poisoned by carbon monoxide as the car was accidentally parked close to the gutter with the exhaust muffler and pipe obstructed by soil. Whereupon, Rep. Sarmiento stated that he considers the staff members in the House of Representatives,... as the unsung heroes behind their legislative and district work, and that each and every one of them is indispensable to their work...; called on the House Officials, especially the Legislative Security Bureau, to impose more stringent patrolling protocols, to include car idling in excess of 30 minutes to ensure the safety and security in all areas of the House...; proposed that they be provided with a lounge where they can stay and wait until the adjournment of each session. (SOURCE: House Journal No.24,p.15)
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : SARMIENTO, EDGAR MARY S.
DATE FILED : 2016-09-20
SIGNIFICANCE: LOCAL
NATURE : Speech-Privilege Hour
